alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 2:50AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ST. JOHNS...NORTH CENTRAL PUTNAM AND CENTRAL CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 315 AM EDT... At 249 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over George`s Lake, or 11 miles north of Interlachen, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, George`s Lake, Penney Farms, and Asbury Lake. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
